section.p: After calling the method to preload a media resource into the playlist, you can call this method to play the preloaded media resource. If you receive the callback reporting the status PlayerStatePlaying, it indicates that playback was successful. If you want to switch to another preloaded media resource, you can call this method again and specify a new media resource path. If you want to replay a media resource, you need to call again to preload it into the playlist before playback. To clear the playlist, call .

After calling the method to preload a media resource into the playlist, you can call this method to play the preloaded media resource. If you receive the callback reporting PlayerStatePlaying, it indicates successful playback. If you want to switch to another preloaded media resource, you can call this method again with a new media resource path. If you want to replay a media resource, you need to call again to preload it into the playlist before playback. To clear the playlist, call .

After calling the method to preload a media resource into the playlist, you can call this method to play the preloaded media resource. After calling this method, if you receive the callback reporting the state as playerStatePlaying, the playback is successful. If you want to change the preloaded media resource being played, you can call this method again and specify a new media resource path. If you want to replay the media resource, you need to call again to preload the media resource into the playlist before playing. To clear the playlist, call .

After calling the method to preload the media resource into the playlist, you can call this method to play the preloaded media resource. If you receive the callback reporting the status as PLAYER_STATE_PLAYING, the playback has succeeded. If you want to switch the preloaded media resource to play, you can call this method again and specify the new media resource path. If you want to replay the media resource, you need to call again to preload the resource into the playlist before playing. To clear the playlist, call .
section.note: If you call this method while playback is paused, it will take effect only after playback resumes.
If you call this method while playback is paused, it will take effect only after playback resumes.

If you call this method while playback is paused, it will take effect only after playback resumes.

plentry.pd: The URL of the media resource in the playlist. It must match the src set by the method, otherwise playback will fail.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
